title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Bass Coast
brief_description: On Victoria’s south-eastern coastline, lie several scenic seaside towns. The residents of Phillip Island, San Remo, Corinella, Bass, Inverloch, Kernot and Grantville talk about how each town enriches their lives, through its distinct character and community spirit.
